testcase.name: [1] ABCD, [GameStep(attempt=BCDF, positions=0, letters=3), GameStep(attempt=ABCD, positions=4, letters=0)], WIN

failure.message:
org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <Welcome to the game!
Two people play this game: one chooses a word (a sequence of letters), the other guesses it. In this version, the computer chooses the word: a sequence of 4 letters (for example, ACEB). The user has several attempts to guess it (the max number is 3). For each attempt, the number of complete matches (letter and position) and partial matches (letter only) is reported.
For example, with ACEB as the hidden word, the BCDF guess will give 1 full match (C) and 1 partial match (B). Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 0 full matches and 3 partial matches. Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 4 full matches and 0 partial matches. Congratulations! You guessed it! > but was: <Welcome to the game!
Two people play this game: one chooses a word (a sequence of letters), the other guesses it. In this version, the computer chooses the word: a sequence of 4 letters (for example, ACEB). The user has several attempts to guess it (the max number is 3). For each attempt, the number of complete matches (letter and position) and partial matches (letter only) is reported.
For example, with ACEB as the hidden word, the BCDF guess will give 1 full match (C) and 1 partial match (B). Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 0 full matches and 3 partial matches. Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Congratulations! You guessed it! >

testcase.name: [2] ABCD, [GameStep(attempt=BCDF, positions=0, letters=3), GameStep(attempt=ABDC, positions=2, letters=2), GameStep(attempt=ABCD, positions=4, letters=0)], WIN

failure.message:
org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: expected: <Welcome to the game!
Two people play this game: one chooses a word (a sequence of letters), the other guesses it. In this version, the computer chooses the word: a sequence of 4 letters (for example, ACEB). The user has several attempts to guess it (the max number is 3). For each attempt, the number of complete matches (letter and position) and partial matches (letter only) is reported.
For example, with ACEB as the hidden word, the BCDF guess will give 1 full match (C) and 1 partial match (B). Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 0 full matches and 3 partial matches. Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 2 full matches and 2 partial matches. Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 4 full matches and 0 partial matches. Congratulations! You guessed it! > but was: <Welcome to the game!
Two people play this game: one chooses a word (a sequence of letters), the other guesses it. In this version, the computer chooses the word: a sequence of 4 letters (for example, ACEB). The user has several attempts to guess it (the max number is 3). For each attempt, the number of complete matches (letter and position) and partial matches (letter only) is reported.
For example, with ACEB as the hidden word, the BCDF guess will give 1 full match (C) and 1 partial match (B). Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 0 full matches and 3 partial matches. Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Your guess has 2 full matches and 2 partial matches. Please input your guess. It should be of length 4. Congratulations! You guessed it! >
